name: Mach 1 Aviation, Inc.
about: Mach 1 Aviation, Inc., located at Van Nuys Airport, is Los Angeles's premier Cirrus Training Center. Founded by Jason Price, a distinguished aviator with extensive certifications and experience, the school is renowned for its commitment to safety and excellence. As a Platinum Cirrus Training Center since 2014, Mach 1 Aviation offers flight instruction above industry standards, with all instructors being FAA Certified and additionally certified by Cirrus. The school provides a range of training programs, including Private Pilot, Commercial Pilot, Instrument Rating, and Multi-Engine Rating. With a well-maintained Cirrus fleet and a team of professional instructors, Mach 1 Aviation ensures every flight is a once-in-a-lifetime experience, equipping pilots with the skills necessary to succeed in the real world of aviation.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Instrument Rating (IR)"]
